markets.title: Will KaiCenat reach at least 1000000 subscribers?
markets.rules_primary: If KaiCenat's peak number of active paid Twitch subscribers is at least 1000000 at any time before Oct 1, 2025, then the market resolves to Yes.
markets.rules_secondary: Active paid Twitch subscribers includes Tier 1 subscriptions (including Prime Gaming), Tier 2, and Tier 3 subscriptions, all counted as single subscriptions without weighting. Gift subscriptions that are currently active are included. Followers, expired subscriptions, channel points, bits, and viewers are NOT included. Only the primary Twitch channel specified at issuance is considered. If the channel is banned or deleted before the deadline, the contract resolves based on the last verifiable peak achieved. The highest subscriber count achieved at any single moment during the period determines resolution. Channel username changes are tracked by unique channel ID and do not affect the market.
markets.early_close_condition: This market will close and expire early if the subscriber threshold is definitively reached.
